# Spectrum analysis


## Vowels

###

```{r}
include_graphics("sounds/for_practice/vowels/merged/1_bag_big.png")
```

```{r, results='asis'}
my_var <- c("bag", "big")
expand.grid(my_var, my_var) %>% 
  filter(Var1 != Var2) %>% 
  summarise(res = str_c(Var1, ', ', Var2)) %>% 
  pull(res) %>% 
  sample() %>% 
  check_question(str_c(my_var, collapse = ", "), options = ., type = "radio") 
```
